/** * Set the name of the parameter to use to determine requested media types. *

By default this is set to {@code "format"}. */ public void setParameterName(String parameterName) { Assert.notNull(parameterName, "'parameterName' is required"). this.parameterName = parameterName. }
@Override @Nullable protected String getMediaTypeKey(NativeWebRequest request) {     return request.getParameter(getParameterName()). }
